django.contrib.auth.context_processors
======================================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.auth.context_processors


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.auth.context_processors.PermLookupDict
   django.contrib.auth.context_processors.PermWrapper


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.auth.context_processors.auth


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: PermLookupDict(user, app_label)

.. py:class:: PermWrapper(user)

   .. py:attribute:: user


.. py:function:: auth(request)

   Return context variables required by apps that use Django's authentication
   system.

   If there is no 'user' attribute in the request, use AnonymousUser (from
   django.contrib.auth).
